title: Honor Level 3
body: Does anyone know how many matches of normal you have to win to get honor level 3?

replies.body:
Yes it is possible to hit honor level 3. I've hit it finally.
https://gyazo.com/4861e03f0352f3cc681335e69f58677c
geez you guys must be getting honoured every single game and you must have been playing a lot
Not really, I just got back into league 3 days ago and I'm already honor level 3
why lie. oh wait everyone thinks you're cool for it. never mind.
Oh, shit, me too. Legit just got it like an hour ago.
Ive also got honor level 3 this afternoon! :3

To be clear, number of wins and number of matches played has almost no bearing on Honour progress (obviously, you still need to play somewhat regularly to progress). That said, there's no "pre-set" quantity of Honours that you need to receive before levelling up. The system is more about consistency than quantity, so there's no real way to "track" your progress, even if you record every honour you receive. The only difference that receiving honours will make is that you will progress (slightly) faster.
Thanks
how can i get honor lvl 3? when the players doesnt honor at all.

All players will gain progress at a standard pace, receiving Honours will just speed up that progress slightly. The Honour system is designed that way so that all players can make progress as long as they stick to the rules and play the game, even if they don't get honoured.

You can read more about how the Honour system works through the [Honour FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008474148).
thats a lie
NVM I JUST GOT LV 3 honor wtf
thank you buddy helped a lot <3 {{champion:16}}
What do wins have to do with honor?
If players unjustifiably report you does it affect your honour progress?
If it's an unjustified report, and there's no evidence to support it, then there should be no impact on Honour level/progress.
basically honours are only for honour rewards not getting reported levels up honour it takes about a month of regular play to get from 2 to 3
I Get a lot of honours with Nami {{champion:267}} at least 1-3 each game.. how long does it take to rank up? is it broken or something? :((

it'll take ages:D :D :D
i think if ur team honors u with the three of the honors u go lvl 3 honor level
No I got at least 5 three honors I didn't go lv 3 honor

It requires honor numbers, not wins.
You can get a total of four honors per match, one from each teammate.

It takes a lot, and I don't know the exact number yet. Sorry.
honors just speeds up the process, so you can rank up w/o getting honors

> [{quoted}](name=Katsoz,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=OO8mTdKG,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-07-04T19:15:58.892+0000)
>
> honors just speeds up the process, so you can rank up w/o getting honors

Speed it up 'slightly' meaning that it's very likely that it has little to no effect. In fact, we don't seem to know what exactly affects how quickly you get to level 3 but we can assume that it's not being reported/punished on a constant basis, the honour part is just to keep everyone following the summoners code I think.
